scripts.start-example-web: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && cp -R ./packages/onekey-sdk-core-ui/dist/onekey-sdk ./examples/web/cdn && cp -R ./packages/onekey-sdk-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn && npx serve ./examples/web/cdn
scripts.build-example-web: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && cp -R ./packages/onekey-sdk-core-ui/dist/onekey-sdk ./examples/web/cdn && cp -R ./packages/onekey-sdk-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn
